property.name: lfNavigationDevName
property.label: Lower footer navigation name
property.description: Pick the target lower footer nav when mode is set to Experience Cloud Navigation.

property.name: ipName
property.label: Lower footer integration procedure name
property.description: Name of the Integration procedure mapping content to this nav (lower footer) when mode is set to Integration Procedure.

property.name: lfInputJSON
property.label: Lower footer input JSON
property.description: JSON formatted input parameters for the Integration procedure (lower footer).

property.name: lfOptionsJSON
property.label: Lower footer options JSON
property.description: JSON formatted options for the Integration procedure (lower footer).

property.name: lfClassName
property.label: Lower footer class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.

property.name: hideMainFooter
property.label: Hide main footer
property.description: Hides the main section of the footer.
